name: One Shot Showdown
description:
A game I made for LD28 that will continue development in the near future.

Controls:
Left click - aim shot
Space - End aim/fire
A, S, D - Player 1 dodging
Left, right, down - Player 2 dodging

D - Debug info (if you like that kinda thing)
R - reset scene (if you get stuck)

Music by Abstraction (https://soundcloud.com/abstraction). Code and art by me.
